channel.title: Barrage Delay
channel.description:
Ok on my server, when I click barrage, then click the NPC, it barrages them right away. How would I make it like rs, you cast it on the npc, and it doesnt do anything until about 4 seconds, then it freezes them. Also, can you make it so they cant cast again until the the freeze after the 4 seconds is over?
I don't care abour RUneScapes delay where it has like the rain things that fly toward them on the delay either. I just want a timer ;)
If you need my barrage code tell me.

item.title: Barrage Delay
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

First, the StillGfx packet has a time delay option, but because the stillgfx(int id) method doesn’t have that, make a new method that does and set the delay to like 55.

However I added Gfx’s to NPCs because there is an update flag on Npcs for Gfx’s, so when they walk it moves with them. That also has a delay option when you write the update, but I don’t think you would be capable of adding that.

Read full topic

item.title: Barrage Delay
item.dc:creator: @hah_bah_gee hah bah gee
item.description:
@hah_bah_gee wrote:

Ummm just set the delay timer to however long you need it lol

Read full topic
